mapper.select: select sub.*, room.room_name from room room, ( select r.*, res.room_num from review r, res res where r.host_num=res.host_num and r.mem_num=res.mem_num and r.host_num=#{host_num}) sub where room.host_num=sub.host_num and room.room_num = sub.room_num
select * from review where ref = #{ref} and re_step = 1
select * from revphoto where host_num=#{host_num} and rev_num=#{rev_num}
select rev_count,host_avg from host where host_num=#{rev_num}
select host_num,mem_num from Res where host_num=#{host_num} and mem_num=#{mem_num}

mapper.update: update Review set rev_content=#{rev_content},rev_date=to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd'),rev_point=#{rev_point} where host_num=#{host_num} and mem_num=#{mem_num} and rev_num=#{rev_num}
mapper.delete: delete from Review where host_num=#{host_num} and rev_num=#{rev_num} and mem_num=#{mem_num}
